metrics.description: Increase in USD Portfolio net deposits post-launch
metrics.detail: Launched the USD Portfolio product with a full GTM strategy, aligning product positioning with customer education campaigns that drove a 164% surge in net deposits within the first quarter.

metrics.description: Growth in acquisition via Homepage Revamp
metrics.detail: Redesigned the homepage acquisition funnel with data-driven messaging and A/B tested layouts, resulting in 35% month-over-month growth in new user sign-ups.

metrics.description: Retention growth in new cohorts via value-based educational onboarding model
metrics.detail: Built a behavioral education framework that doubled user retention from 15% to 31%, turning first-time depositors into long-term investors through targeted lifecycle campaigns.

metrics.description: Seasonal CNY Revenue Growth via hyper localized content strategy
metrics.detail: Managed diverse stakeholders (Country Managers, Design, Product) to deliver a localized yet consistent narrative and synchronizing promotional offers across digital and CRM channels that drove 60% YoY growth in client deposits.

Led a brand pivot to differentiate the product from emerging competitors by moving the value proposition away from generic pricing. Orchestrated a rollout that successfully established a unique "wealth impact" market position, driving higher user conversions and a 15% drop in CAC.

metrics.description: MoM growth for Shopee Store via dynamic bundling
metrics.detail: Developed a dynamic bundling strategy for the Shopee store, using real-time sales data to optimize product combinations and drive 200% month-over-month revenue growth.

metrics.description: Market reach expansion via Touch 'n Go integration
metrics.detail: Negotiated and executed a strategic integration with Touch 'n Go's Super App ecosystem, expanding market reach by 37% through embedded financial services.

metrics.description: MoM sales increase via bank partnership
metrics.detail: Structured a co-marketing partnership with a major bank, creating exclusive product bundles that drove a 300% month-over-month increase in sales volume.

metrics.description: Time to unit profitability for US Treasury product
metrics.detail: Managed the full P&L for the US Treasury product launch, optimizing acquisition costs and pricing strategy to achieve unit profitability within just 6 months.
